STRINGS.STRING: This feature allows the user to reset the fuel injector when replacing or moving an injector between cylinders.

Initial Conditions 1. This reset may be run anytime the tool is connected to the ECM Steps 1. Select all injectors that need to be reset 2. Select Reset to reset the selected injectors Additional Information: 1. ONLY select the injectors that have been replaced, or have been moved between cylinders during the troubleshooting process.
Injector {0} has been selected for reset. To perform the reset select Yes. To return to selections select No.
This feature is not supported by the current calibration.
Injectors {0} have been selected for reset.To perform the reset select Yes. To return to selections select No.
All injector reset commands have been sent to ECM.

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>47000</ErrorNumber><Description>INSITE can not read the ECM parameters when connected to the ECM. Please contact technical support.</Description><Suggestion>Check if the parameter(s) is supported in the calibration.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>47001</ErrorNumber><Description>One or more injectors have not been reset. A key off is required to complete the process on the injectors that were successfully reset.</Description><Suggestion>Please reconnect and retry the operation.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
